content: Singaporean politician (born 1956) **Madeleine Ho Geok Choo** ([Chinese](/wiki/Simplified_Chinese_characters): 何玉珠; [pinyin](/wiki/Pinyin): *Hé Yùzhū*; born 15 April 1956) is a Singaporean former politician. A former member of the governing [People's Action Party](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) (PAP), she was the [Member of Parliament](/wiki/Parliament_of_Singapore) (MP) serving the [Boon Lay](/wiki/Boon_Lay) division of [West Coast Group Representation Constituency](/wiki/West_Coast_Group_Representation_Constituency) between 2001 and 2011. She is currently the [chief executive officer](/wiki/Chief_executive_officer) of Human Capital Singapore. ## Personal life Ho's father, Ho See Beng, was a former PAP Member of Parliament. Ho graduated from the [National University of Singapore](/wiki/National_University_of_Singapore) with a [Master of Science](/wiki/Master_of_Science) degree in human resource management. This article about a politician from Singapore is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Ho Geok Choo
